issue.title: Change the SDF spec to make <plugin> less gazebo-specific

content.raw: Does it make a lot of sense to use the plugin class as the 'type' attribute ? I would think that the plugin type is constrained by where the plugin tag is (i.e. a plugin inside a <model> can only be a ModelTask), in which case just `gazebo` would be enough.
